C

ca.mcgill.ecse211.capturetheflag - package ca.mcgill.ecse211.capturetheflag
 
closestIntersection() - Method in class ca.mcgill.ecse211.capturetheflag.NavigationController
Returns the coordinate of the closest intersection from the robot from its odometer values.
colorLocalisation(boolean) - Method in class ca.mcgill.ecse211.capturetheflag.Localisation
Performs the color localisation routine assuming the robot is positioned relatively close to an intersection of two lines
ColorLocalisationData - Class in ca.mcgill.ecse211.capturetheflag
The ColorLocalisationData class is used to process the data coming from the color poller An interrupt is sent to the Localisation class when a line is detected.
ColorLocalisationData() - Constructor for class ca.mcgill.ecse211.capturetheflag.ColorLocalisationData
Creates a ColorLocalisationData object.
colorLocalisationRoutine(boolean) - Method in class ca.mcgill.ecse211.capturetheflag.LocalisationController
Performs a localisation routine with the assumption that the robot's center of rotation in on or close to the intersection of two line
ColorPoller - Class in ca.mcgill.ecse211.capturetheflag
The ColorPoller class is used to periodically poll one or multiple color sensors and send the data to be processed to a Data class A state machine is incorporated such that the color sensor polled will be the correct one(s) and the data will be sent to the correct processing class.
ColorPoller(SampleProvider, float[], SampleProvider, float[], SampleProvider, float[], ColorLocalisationData, ZiplineLightData, BlockSearchingData) - Constructor for class ca.mcgill.ecse211.capturetheflag.ColorPoller
Creates a CollorPoller object.
ColorPoller.ColorPollingState - Enum in ca.mcgill.ecse211.capturetheflag
This enumeration defines the states in which the ColorPoller can be in.
convertAngle(double, double, double) - Method in class ca.mcgill.ecse211.capturetheflag.Navigation
Converts distance to wheel rotation required for the physical robot to turn by a certain angle around its center of rotation.
convertDistance(double, double) - Method in class ca.mcgill.ecse211.capturetheflag.Navigation
Converts a distance to wheel rotation.
Coordinate - Class in ca.mcgill.ecse211.capturetheflag
Simple class to represent the coordinates where the robot will travel
Coordinate(double, double) - Constructor for class ca.mcgill.ecse211.capturetheflag.Coordinate
Creates a Coordinate Object
